title: Brain Alphabet
content:
It's not typography, but I'm sure some   
of you will enjoy the [Brain Alphabet](http://web.archive.org/web/20051126210524/http:/faculty.washington.edu/chudler/alpha.html).   
   
_“Each letter is a close-up of gyri (bumps) and sulci (grooves)   
found on the surface of the human brain.”_
author: puffinry
